meanings.definition: The quality of being frightening or causing fear.
meanings.sent1: The scariness of the haunted house made me shiver.
meanings.sent2: The scariness of the dark forest kept me awake at night.
meanings.sent3: The scariness of the horror movie made me jump in my seat.
meanings.sent4: The scariness of the unknown lurked in the shadows.
meanings.sent5: The scariness of the ghost story lingered long after it was told.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being scary.
meanings.sent1: The scariness of the roller coaster ride thrilled the kids.
meanings.sent2: The scariness of the thunderstorm caused the dog to hide under the bed.
meanings.sent3: The scariness of the costume party made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The scariness of the situation was like walking on thin ice.
meanings.sent5: The scariness of the haunted house was palpable as we approached.
